alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 3:32AM CDT until October 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. There is a 20 percent chance for 12 inches or more total snow accumulations. Winds could gust up to 30 mph, mainly Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson and Ramsey Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times. Heavy snow rates could reduce visibilities at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the commutes this evening through Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate snow starts after 4 PM today lasting through tonight. There may be a decrease in snowfall rates and coverage Thursday morning before another round of heavier snow arrives Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
